file.name: schema.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
 - url: https://{environment}.osis.uclouvain.be/api/v1/education_group/
   variables:
     environment:
       default: dev
       enum:
         - dev # Development server
         - qa # Staging server
         - test # Test server
 - url: https://osis.uclouvain.be/api/v1/education_group/
   description: 'Production server'
info:
  version: '1.08'
  title: 'Education Group Service'
  description: |-
    A set of API endpoints that allow you to get, update, delete an education group.
paths:
  /trainings/:
    get:
      description: Return a list of all the training with optional filtering.
      operationId: trainings_list
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: limit
          schema:
            description: Number of results to return per page.
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: offset
          schema:
            description: The initial index from which to return the results.
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: acronym
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: partial_acronym
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: title
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: education_group_type
          schema:
            description: Filter result by specified training types
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
          style: form
          explode: true
        - in: query
          name: active
          schema:
            description: Filter result by specified active status of training
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
          style: form
          explode: true
        - in: query
          name: from_year
          schema:
            description: From which training year we want to display
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: to_year
          schema:
            description: To which training year we want to display
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: title_english
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: campus
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: ares_ability
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: year
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: ordering
          schema:
            description: Which field to use when ordering the results.
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: search
          schema:
            description: A search term.
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: study_domain
          schema:
            description: UUID of main study domain
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaginatedTraining'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/offer_roots:
    get:
      description: Return the list of offer roots for a training.
      operationId: trainings_offer_roots
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaginatedTraining'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}:
    get:
      description: Return the detail of the training
      operationId: trainings_read
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TrainingDetailed'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the training (standard version)
      operationId: training_prerequisites_official
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/versions/{version_name}:
    get:
      description: Return the detail of the training version
      operationId: training_version
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/TrainingDetailed'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/versions/{version_name}/tree:
    get:
      description: Return the tree of the version
      operationId: versions_tree
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tree'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/versions/{version_name}/title:
    get:
      description: Return the title of the training
      operationId: trainingsversiontitle_read
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: integer
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: lang
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  title:
                    type: string
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/tree:
    get:
      description: Return the tree of the training
      operationId: trainings_tree
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tree'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /trainings/{year}/{acronym}/title:
    get:
      description: Return the title of the training
      operationId: trainingstitle_read
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: integer
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: lang
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  title:
                    type: string
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - trainings
  /groups/{year}/{partial_acronym}:
    get:
      description: Return the detail of the group
      operationId: groups_read
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: partial_acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/GroupDetailed'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - groups
  /groups/{year}/{partial_acronym}/tree:
    get:
      description: Return the tree of the group
      operationId: groups_tree
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: partial_acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tree'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - groups
  /groups/{year}/{partial_acronym}/title:
    get:
      description: Return the title of the group
      operationId: groupstitle_read
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: integer
        - in: path
          name: partial_acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: lang
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  title:
                    type: string
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - groups
  /hops/{year}:
    get:
      description: Return the list of used habilitations for a given year.
      operationId: habilitations_list
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Hops'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
      tags:
        - habilitation_list
  /mini_trainings/:
    get:
      description: Return a list of all the mini_trainings with optional filtering.
      operationId: minitrainings_list
      parameters:
        - in: query
          name: limit
          schema:
            description: Number of results to return per page.
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: offset
          schema:
            description: The initial index from which to return the results.
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: acronym
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: code
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: title
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: from_year
          schema:
            description: From which mini-training year we want to display
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: to_year
          schema:
            description: To which mini-training year we want to display
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: year
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: integer
        - in: query
          name: education_group_type
          schema:
            description: Filter result by specified mini-training types
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
          style: form
          explode: true
        - in: query
          name: active
          schema:
            description: Filter result by specified active status of mini-training
            type: array
            items:
              type: string
          style: form
          explode: true
        - in: query
          name: campus
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: ordering
          schema:
            description: Which field to use when ordering the results.
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: search
          schema:
            description: A search term.
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaginatedMiniTraining'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/prerequisites:
    get:
      description: Return the prerequisites of the learning units of the mini-training (standard version)
      operationId: mini-training_prerequisites_official
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/offer_roots:
    get:
      description: Return the list of offer roots for a mini training.
      operationId: minitrainings_offer_roots
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaginatedTraining'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}:
    get:
      description: Return the detail of the mini-training
      operationId: minitrainings_read
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/MiniTrainingDetailed'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/tree:
    get:
      description: Return the tree of the mini-training
      operationId: minitraining_tree
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tree'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/title:
    get:
      description: Return the title of the mini training
      operationId: minitrainingstitle_read
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: integer
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: lang
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  title:
                    type: string
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/versions/{version_name}:
    get:
      description: Return the detail of the mini training version
      operationId: mini_training_version
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/MiniTrainingDetailed'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/versions/{version_name}/tree:
    get:
      description: Return the tree of the version
      operationId: minitraining_version_tree
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Tree'
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
  /mini_trainings/{year}/{acronym}/versions/{version_name}/title:
    get:
      description: Return the title of the mini training
      operationId: minitrainings_title_version_read
      parameters:
        - in: path
          name: year
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: integer
        - in: path
          name: acronym
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: path
          name: version_name
          required: true
          schema:
            description: ''
            type: string
        - in: query
          name: lang
          schema:
            type: string
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/Accept-Language'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-FirstName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-LastName'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-Email'
        - $ref: '#/components/parameters/X-User-GlobalID'
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  title:
                    type: string
        '400':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/BadRequest'
        '401':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/Unauthorized'
        '404':
          $ref: '#/components/responses/NotFound'
      tags:
        - mini_trainings
components:
  securitySchemes:
    Token:
      type: apiKey
      in: header
      name: Authorization
      description: Enter your token in the format **Token <token>**
  parameters:
    X-User-FirstName:
      in: header
      name: X-User-FirstName
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    X-User-LastName:
      in: header
      name: X-User-LastName
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    X-User-Email:
      in: header
      name: X-User-Email
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    X-User-GlobalID:
      in: header
      name: X-User-GlobalID
      schema:
        type: string
      required: false
    Accept-Language:
      in: header
      name: Accept-Language
      description: >
        The header advertises which languages the client is able to understand, and which locale variant is preferred. (By languages, we mean natural languages, such as English, and not programming languages.)
      schema:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/AcceptedLanguageEnum'
      required: false
  responses:
    Unauthorized:
      description: Unauthorized
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    BadRequest:
      description: Bad request
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
    NotFound:
      description: The specified resource was not found
      content:
        application/json:
          schema:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Error'
  schemas:
    AcceptedLanguageEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'en'
        - 'fr-be'
    Pagination:
      type: object
      properties:
        count:
          type: integer
        next:
          type: string
          format: uri
        previous:
          type: string
          format: uri
    ArrayOfProgramTreePrerequisites:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProgramTreePrerequisites'
    ProgramTreePrerequisites:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        code:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        title_en:
          type: string
        prerequisites_string:
          type: string
          example: (codeA OR codeB) AND (codeC)
        prerequisites:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeBase'
    NodeBase:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        title:
          type: string
        title_en:
          type: string
    Hops:
      type: object
      properties:
        count:
          type: integer
        ares_abilities:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
    ArrayOfVersions:
      type: array
      items:
        $ref: '#/components/schemas/Version'
    Version:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        version_name:
          type: string
        code:
          type: string
        transition_name:
          type: string
        is_transition:
          type: boolean
      required:
        - url
        - version_name
        - code
        - transition_name
        - is_transition
    PaginatedTraining:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pagination'
        - type: object
          properties:
            results:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Training'
    Training:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        acronym:
          type: string
        education_group_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/TrainingTypeEnum'
        education_group_type_text:
          type: string
        code:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        title_en:
          type: string
        academic_year:
          type: number
        administration_entity:
          type: string
        administration_faculty:
          type: string
        management_entity:
          type: string
        management_faculty:
          type: string
        ares_ability:
          type: integer
        ares_graca:
          type: integer
        ares_study:
          type: integer
        partial_title:
          type: string
        partial_title_en:
          type: string
      required:
        - url
        - acronym
        - education_group_type
        - education_group_type_text
        - code
        - title
        - academic_year
        - administration_entity
        - management_entity
        - ares_ability
        - ares_graca
        - ares_study
    TrainingDetailed:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Training'
        - type: object
          properties:
            active:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActiveEnum'
            active_text:
              type: string
            partial_deliberation:
              type: boolean
            admission_exam:
              type: boolean
            funding:
              type: boolean
            funding_direction:
              type: string
            funding_cud:
              type: boolean
            funding_direction_cud:
              type: string
            academic_type:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/AcademicTypeEnum'
            academic_type_text:
              type: string
            university_certificate:
              type: boolean
            enrollment_campus:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Campus'
            main_teaching_campus:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Campus'
            dissertation:
              type: boolean
            internship:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/InternshipPresenceEnum'
            internship_text:
              type: string
            schedule_type:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ScheduleTypeEnum'
            schedule_type_text:
              type: string
            english_activities:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActivityPresenceEnum'
            english_activities_text:
              type: string
            other_language_activities:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActivityPresenceEnum'
            other_language_activities_text:
              type: string
            other_campus_activities:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActivityPresenceEnum'
            other_campus_activities_text:
              type: string
            professional_title:
              type: string
            joint_diploma:
              type: boolean
            diploma_printing_orientation:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PrintOrientationEnum'
            diploma_printing_orientation_text:
              type: string
            diploma_printing_title:
              type: string
            inter_organization_information:
              type: string
            inter_university_french_community:
              type: boolean
            inter_university_belgium:
              type: boolean
            inter_university_abroad:
              type: boolean
            primary_language:
              type: string
              description: |
                The language code according to ISO 639-1 specification (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes)
            keywords:
              type: string
            duration:
              type: integer
              minimum: 1
            duration_unit:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/DurationUnitEnum'
            duration_unit_text:
              type: string
            enrollment_enabled:
              type: boolean
            credits:
              type: integer
              minimum: 1
            remark:
              type: string
            remark_en:
              type: string
            min_constraint:
              type: integer
              minimum: 1
            max_constraint:
              type: integer
              minimum: 1
            constraint_type:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConstraintTypeEnum'
            constraint_type_text:
              type: string
            weighting:
              type: boolean
            default_learning_unit_enrollment:
              type: boolean
            decree_category:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/DecreeCategoryEnum'
            decree_category_text:
              type: string
            rate_code:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/RateCodeEnum'
            rate_code_text:
              type: string
            internal_comment:
              type: string
            co_graduation:
              type: string
            co_graduation_coefficient:
              type: number
            web_re_registration:
              type: boolean
            domain_name:
              type: string
            domain_code:
              type: string
            version_name:
              type: string
            transition_name:
              type: string
            versions:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfVersions'
    GroupDetailed:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        acronym:
          type: string
        code:
          type: string
        management_entity:
          type: string
        management_faculty:
          type: string
        academic_year:
          type: number
        education_group_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/GroupTypeEnum'
        education_group_type_text:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        title_en:
          type: string
        credits:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
        min_constraint:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
        max_constraint:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
        constraint_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConstraintTypeEnum'
        constraint_type_text:
          type: string
        remark:
          type: string
        remark_en:
          type: string
        campus:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Campus'
    PaginatedMiniTraining:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/Pagination'
        - type: object
          properties:
            results:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/MiniTraining'
    MiniTraining:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        acronym:
          type: string
        code:
          type: string
        management_entity:
          type: string
        management_faculty:
          type: string
        academic_year:
          type: number
        education_group_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/MiniTrainingTypeEnum'
        education_group_type_text:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        title_en:
          type: string
    MiniTrainingDetailed:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/MiniTraining'
        - type: object
          properties:
            version_name:
              type: string
            credits:
              type: integer
              minimum: 1
            min_constraint:
              type: integer
              minimum: 1
            max_constraint:
              type: integer
              minimum: 1
            constraint_type:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConstraintTypeEnum'
            constraint_type_text:
              type: string
            remark:
              type: string
            remark_en:
              type: string
            campus:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/Campus'
            keywords:
              type: string
            active:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ActiveEnum'
            active_text:
              type: string
            schedule_type:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ScheduleTypeEnum'
            schedule_type_text:
              type: string
            versions:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ArrayOfVersions'
    Tree:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        acronym:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        title_en:
          type: string
        node_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeTypeEnum'
        subtype:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeSubTypeEnum'
        partial_title:
          type: string
        partial_title_en:
          type: string
        min_constraint:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
        max_constraint:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
        constraint_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConstraintTypeEnum'
        remark:
          type: string
        remark_en:
          type: string
        version_name:
          type: string
        children:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Node'
      required:
        - url
        - acronym
        - title
        - type
        - children
    Campus:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
        is_administration:
          type: boolean
        organization:
          type: string
    Node:
      type: object
      properties:
        url:
          type: string
          format: uri
        acronym:
          type: string
        code:
          type: string
        title:
          type: string
        title_en:
          type: string
        node_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeTypeEnum'
        subtype:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeSubTypeEnum'
        partial_title:
          type: string
        partial_title_en:
          type: string
        credits:
          type: number
        is_mandatory:
          type: boolean
        block:
          type: array
          items:
            type: integer
        lecturing_volume:
          type: number
        practical_exercise_volume:
          type: number
        proposal_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ProposalTypeEnum'
        status:
          type: boolean
        quadrimester:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/QuadrimesterEnum'
        periodicity:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PeriodicityEnum'
        access_condition:
          type: boolean
        comment:
          type: string
        comment_en:
          type: string
        remark:
          type: string
        remark_en:
          type: string
        link_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/NodeLinkTypeEnum'
        link_type_text:
          type: string
        with_prerequisite:
          type: boolean
        min_constraint:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
        max_constraint:
          type: integer
          minimum: 1
        constraint_type:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ConstraintTypeEnum'
        version_name:
          type: string
        language:
          type: string
          description: |
            The language code according to ISO 639-1 specification (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes)
        french_friendly:
          type: boolean
        english_friendly:
          type: boolean
        exchange_students:
          type: boolean
        children:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Node'
      required:
        - url
        - code
        - title
        - node_type
        - subtype
        - is_mandatory
        - block
        - access_condition
        - comment
        - remark
        - remark_en
        - link_type
        - link_type_text
        - children
    ActiveEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'ACTIVE'
        - 'INACTIVE'
        - 'RE_REGISTRATION'
    NodeTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'GROUP'
        - 'TRAINING'
        - 'MINI_TRAINING'
        - 'LEARNING_UNIT'
    LearningUnitTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'COURSE'
        - 'INTERNSHIP'
        - 'DISSERTATION'
        - 'OTHER_COLLECTIVE'
        - 'OTHER_INDIVIDUAL'
        - 'MASTER_THESIS'
        - 'EXTERNAL'
    NodeSubTypeEnum:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/LearningUnitTypeEnum'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/MiniTrainingTypeEnum'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/TrainingTypeEnum'
        - $ref: '#/components/schemas/GroupTypeEnum'
    NodeLinkTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'REFERENCE'
    InternshipPresenceEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'YES'
        - 'NO'
        - 'OPTIONAL'
    ScheduleTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'DAILY'
        - 'SHIFTED'
        - 'ADAPTED'
    ActivityPresenceEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'YES'
        - 'NO'
        - 'OPTIONAL'
    PrintOrientationEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'NO_PRINT'
        - 'IN_HEADING_2_OF_DIPLOMA'
        - 'IN_EXPECTED_FORM'
    DurationUnitEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'QUADRIMESTER'
        - 'TRIMESTER'
        - 'MONTH'
        - 'WEEK'
        - 'DAY'
    ConstraintTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'CREDITS'
        - 'NUMBER_OF_ELEMENTS'
    DecreeCategoryEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'FCONT'
        - 'DOC'
        - 'BAC'
        - 'MA1'
        - 'MA2X'
        - 'MA2D'
        - 'MA2S'
        - 'MA2A'
        - 'MA2M'
        - 'MACO'
        - 'AESSB'
        - 'CAPS'
        - 'FODO'
        - 'DOCB'
        - 'CEMC'
    RateCodeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'NO_ADDITIONAL_FEES'
        - 'AESS_CAPAES'
        - 'MINERVAL_COMPLETE'
        - 'UNIVERSITY_CERTIFICATE'
        - 'ADVANCED_MASTER_IN_MEDICAL_SPECIALIZATION'
        - 'ACCESS_CONTEST'
        - 'UNIVERSITY_CERTIFICATE_30_CREDITS'
        - 'CERTIFICATE_MEDECINE_COMPETENCE'
    TrainingTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'AGGREGATION'
        - 'CERTIFICATE_OF_PARTICIPATION'
        - 'CERTIFICATE_OF_SUCCESS'
        - 'CERTIFICATE_OF_HOLDING_CREDITS'
        - 'BACHELOR'
        - 'CERTIFICATE'
        - 'CAPAES'
        - 'RESEARCH_CERTIFICATE'
        - 'UNIVERSITY_FIRST_CYCLE_CERTIFICATE'
        - 'UNIVERSITY_SECOND_CYCLE_CERTIFICATE'
        - 'ACCESS_CONTEST'
        - 'LANGUAGE_CLASS'
        - 'ISOLATED_CLASS'
        - 'PHD'
        - 'FORMATION_PHD'
        - 'JUNIOR_YEAR'
        - 'PGRM_MASTER_120'
        - 'MASTER_MA_120'
        - 'MASTER_MD_120'
        - 'MASTER_MS_120'
        - 'PGRM_MASTER_180_240'
        - 'MASTER_MA_180_240'
        - 'MASTER_MD_180_240'
        - 'MASTER_MS_180_240'
        - 'MASTER_M1'
        - 'MASTER_MC'
        - 'INTERNSHIP'
    GroupTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'COMMON_CORE'
        - 'MINOR_LIST_CHOICE'
        - 'MAJOR_LIST_CHOICE'
        - 'OPTION_LIST_CHOICE'
        - 'FINALITY_120_LIST_CHOICE'
        - 'FINALITY_180_LIST_CHOICE'
        - 'MOBILITY_PARTNERSHIP_LIST_CHOICE'
        - 'COMPLEMENTARY_MODULE'
        - 'SUB_GROUP'
    MiniTrainingTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'DEEPENING'
        - 'SOCIETY_MINOR'
        - 'ACCESS_MINOR'
        - 'OPEN_MINOR'
        - 'DISCIPLINARY_COMPLEMENT_MINOR'
        - 'FSA_SPECIALITY'
        - 'OPTION'
        - 'MOBILITY_PARTNERSHIP'
    AcademicTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'NON_ACADEMIC'
        - 'NON_ACADEMIC_CREF'
        - 'ACADEMIC'
    QuadrimesterEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'Q1'
        - 'Q2'
        - 'Q3'
        - 'Q1and2'
        - 'Q1or2'
    PeriodicityEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'ANNUAL'
        - 'BIENNIAL_EVEN'
        - 'BIENNIAL_ODD'
    ProposalTypeEnum:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'CREATION'
        - 'MODIFICATION'
        - 'TRANSFORMATION'
        - 'SUPPRESSION'
        - 'TRANSFORMATION_AND_MODIFICATION'
    Error:
      type: object
      properties:
        code:
          type: string
        message:
          type: string
      required:
        - code
        - message
security:
  - Token: []

Error: notImplemented: path "/groups/{year}/{partial_acronym}/tree": get: responses: 200: contents: application/json: generate schema: field children: item: field subtype: allOf: enum: allOf enum merging not implemented
